page.title: 01 OUR AREA
page.content: The land in our area is mainly agricultural.There are 19 farms,which grow mainly wheat,barley and oil seed rape.Some of the farms have a few animals but their main source of income is from crops for human consumption.There are very few people living in our area so there are no major towns or villages only a small hamlet of about a dozen houses.Many of the people that do live here belong to the upper social classes,having large houses,often of historical interest with extensive grounds.There is only 14 km of road in this area but there are many farm tracks and footpaths.The uncultivated land in the area is either used for recreational pass times eg.flying club,racing track or is covered with deciduous woodland.
